data.stubGenerator:
read offset:int
read message:string(256)
write encoded message
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1>>: an integer [[offset]] the value of the offset
<<Line 2>>: a string the [[message]] to encode

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Jerry the director of WHOOP is sick of his plan failing because his agents keep adding the same signature Agent followed by the first letter of their name.
That's why you've been hired to created an algorithm which deletes the signature at the end while encoding the message using the Caesar code (a constant offset is added to the ASCII value of each character) except the spaces which stay spaces.
The signature is always in the format Agent X
Input
Line 1: an integer offset the value of the offset
Line 2: a string the message to encode
Output
Line 1: a string the encoded message
Constraints
0<offset<=30
Example
Input
3
Test micro Agent J
Output
Qbpq jf`ol
